Package rules

Class RuleFileManager

java.lang.Object
rules.RuleFileManager
public class RuleFileManager extends Object
Class that deals with the rule history methods. Does not need instantiation as every method is static.

  • Field Summary

    Field
    Description
    static String
    HISTORY_FILE_PATH
    Path for the default rule history file.

  • Constructor Details

  • Method Details

    • writeEntry

      public static void writeEntry​(List<Rule> rules, String filePath)
      Save the specified rule list in the history file. This method will read the history file by calling the readRules(String) method, and add a new entry to the read HashMap with the current date as a key and the list of rules as a value. Finally, it writes the new HashMap to the file.
      Parameters:
      rules - List of rules to write to history file.
      filePath - to Rule history file.

    • readRules

      public static LinkedHashMap<String,​List<Rule>> readRules​(String filePath)
      Reads the first object in the specified file and returns it as a LinkedHashMap<String, List<Rule>>
      Parameters:
      filePath - to Rule history file.
      Returns:
      LinkedHashMap containing all saved rules. Each entry is composed by a key with the date the rule was saved and a value with a list of rules.

    • clearHistory

      public static void clearHistory​(String filePath)
      Deletes the specified file.
      Parameters:
      filePath - to Rule history file.
